UI_visible_response: Read 18 web pagesView Page Details"China's Wailing Wall" refers to the Weibo page of Dr. Li Wenliang. Dr. Li was an ophthalmologist who warned about the COVID-19 outbreak in late 2019 but was initially silenced by authorities. After his death in February 2020, his Weibo page became a place where hundreds of thousands of netizens left messages expressing grief, calling for justice, and discussing broader issues related to freedom of speech. This page is likened to the Western Wall in Jerusalem, where people leave written prayers in the cracks.CopyTry AgainShare
traffic_visible_response: "China's Wailing Wall" refers to the Weibo page of Dr. Li Wenliang[^3^]. Dr. Li was an ophthalmologist who warned about the COVID-19 outbreak in late 2019 but was initially silenced by authorities[^3^]. After his death in February 2020, his Weibo page became a place where hundreds of thousands of netizens left messages expressing grief, calling for justice, and discussing broader issues related to freedom of speech[^3^]. This page is likened to the Western Wall in Jerusalem, where people leave written prayers in the cracks[^2^][^4^].
